user.title: Create a Mood
user.description: Give your mood a memorable name that describes when you'll use it (e.g., 'Movie Night', 'Morning Coffee', 'Party').

select_lights.title: Choose Lights
select_lights.description: Select which lights this mood should control. You can choose multiple lights that will change together.

configure_lights.title: Configure Lights
configure_lights.description: For each light, enable and configure the settings you want to apply when this mood is activated.

error.no_lights_selected: Please select at least one light.

activate_mood.name: Activate Mood
activate_mood.description: Activate a mood, saving current light states first.

mood_id.name: Mood ID
mood_id.description: The unique identifier of the mood (e.g. mood_0).

preset_name.name: Preset Name
preset_name.description: Optional label for the state snapshot saved before activation.

restore_previous.name: Restore Previous
restore_previous.description: Restore the lights for a mood to their last saved state.

mood_id.name: Mood ID
mood_id.description: The unique identifier of the mood to restore.

save_state.name: Save State
save_state.description: Manually snapshot the current state of a mood's lights.

mood_id.name: Mood ID
mood_id.description: The unique identifier of the mood whose lights to snapshot.
